trans-unit.source: Provides properties for accessing the current local time and Universal Coordinated Time (equivalent to Greenwich Mean Time) from the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于访问从系统时钟的当前本地时间和协调世界时 （相当于格林威治标准时间） 属性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Clock` object provides properties to find the current local time for the computer and the UTC time.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Clock`对象提供的属性来查找计算机和的 UTC 时间的当前本地时间。

trans-unit.source: It also exposes the millisecond count from the computer's system timer.
trans-unit.target: 它还使来自计算机的系统计时器的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> object that contains the current local date and time on the computer, expressed as a UTC (GMT) time.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref>对象，其中包含的当前日期和时间的计算机上，表示为 UTC (GMT) 时间。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Clock.GmtTime` property has the same behavior as the <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Clock.GmtTime`属性具有相同的行为<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 项目类型的可用性 | | | |-|-| |项目类型 |可用 | |Windows 应用程序 |**Yes**| |类库 |**Yes**| |控制台应用程序 |**Yes**| |Windows 控件库 |**Yes**| |Web 控件库 |**Yes**| |Windows 服务 |**Yes**| |网站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> object that contains the current date and time expressed as UTC (GMT) time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""> </xref>对象，其中包含当前日期和时间表示为 UTC (GMT) 时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> object that contains the current local date and time on this computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref>包含当前日期和时间在此计算机上的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Clock.LocalTime` property has the same behavior as the <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Clock.LocalTime`属性具有相同的行为<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 项目类型的可用性 | | | |-|-| |项目类型 |可用 | |Windows 应用程序 |**Yes**| |类库 |**Yes**| |控制台应用程序 |**Yes**| |Windows 控件库 |**Yes**| |Web 控件库 |**Yes**| |Windows 服务 |**Yes**| |网站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""></xref> object that contains the current local date and time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Date" name="Date" href=""> </xref>对象，其中包含当前日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the millisecond count from the computer's system timer.
trans-unit.target: 从计算机的系统计时器获取毫秒计数。

trans-unit.source: The `TickCount` property provides access to the computer's system timer, which runs when the computer is active.
trans-unit.target: `TickCount`属性提供对计算机的系统计时器，计算机处于活动状态时运行的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The timer resolution is not less than 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 计时器分辨率不小于 500 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to make your application's behavior dependent on the length of time it has been running, or you can use it to label events, both of which are independent of the computer's clock.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以使应用程序的行为取决于已运行的时间的长度或可以使用它来标注事件，这两种是独立的计算机的时钟。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When the value of the `TickCount` property reaches the maximum integer value (<xref:System.Int32>), it then jumps to the minimum integer value (<xref:System.Int32>), a negative number, and continues to increment.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 时的值`TickCount`属性达到最大整数值 (<xref:System.Int32>)，它然后跳转到的最小整数值 (<xref:System.Int32>)，负数，并继续递增。</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: If the computer runs continuously, `TickCount` increments from zero to the maximum integer value in approximately 24.9 days.
trans-unit.target: 如果计算机连续运行，`TickCount`从零到大约 24.9 天中的最大整数值的增量。

trans-unit.source: The `TickCount` property increments only when the operating system is running; it pauses when the computer goes into certain power-saving modes, such as standby or hibernation.
trans-unit.target: `TickCount`属性递增时才运行的操作系统; 当计算机将进入某些节能模式，如待机或休眠状态时，它将暂停。

trans-unit.source: The `TickCount` property is unrelated to the computer's clock setting.
trans-unit.target: `TickCount`属性与计算机的时钟设置无关。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock.LocalTime%2A> property or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock.GmtTime%2A> property to obtain the current local date and time on this computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock.LocalTime%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock.GmtTime%2A>属性来获取的当前日期和时间在此计算机上的。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock.GmtTime%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Clock.LocalTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Clock.TickCount` property has the same behavior as the <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Clock.TickCount`属性具有相同的行为<xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|**Yes**| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|**Yes**|
trans-unit.target: 项目类型的可用性 | | | |-|-| |项目类型 |可用 | |Windows 应用程序 |**Yes**| |类库 |**Yes**| |控制台应用程序 |**Yes**| |Windows 控件库 |**Yes**| |Web 控件库 |**Yes**| |Windows 服务 |**Yes**| |网站 |**Yes**|

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> containing the millisecond count from the computer's system timer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref>包含来自计算机的系统计时器的毫秒数。
